vocabInfos.mediumDef:
bath, a unit of liquid measure, equal to dry measure ephah (about 9 imperial gallons or 40 litres, rabbinical writings give sizes of one-half this amount)
Aramaic equivalent: bat (בַּת "bath" H1325)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (b)   bato; unidad de medida para líquidos de 22 litros o 6 galones; 1 bato corresponde a 1 efa en las medidas para áridos
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
罷特, 測量液體的單位, 等於測量乾物的單位伊法
(大約9英加侖或40公升, 在拉比著作中只有前述的一半容量)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
罢特, 测量液体的单位, 等于测量干物的单位伊法
(大约9英加仑或40公升, 在拉比著作中只有前述的一半容量)
